welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sunbury, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Sunbury has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Penn Valley Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Penn Valley Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lycoming County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lycoming County Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
